About Me

I’m a Site Reliability Engineer with 10+ years of experience across automation, reliability, security, observability, and cloud infrastructure. I focus on making systems resilient, fast, and easy to operate.

I started as the first DevOps Engineer at a startup, building the infrastructure and CI/CD pipelines from the ground up. Since then I’ve worked at mid‑size and large companies, with responsibilities ranging from full‑stack operations to deep platform specialization.

Today I’m at Udemy, focused on reliability at scale and building developer tooling.

What I do

I build reliable, observable platforms that teams can ship on with confidence. That includes making deployments safer, reducing incident risk, and automating the repetitive stuff so engineers can move faster.

Skills

  • Reliability: SLOs, incident response, capacity planning
  • Platform: Kubernetes, Helm, Skaffold, Terraform, Istio, Argo CD
  • Observability: OpenTelemetry, Datadog

Certifications

  • AWS Certified Developer - Associate
  • AWS Certified Solutions Architect - Associate
  • Red Hat Certified Systems Administrator (RHCSA)
  • Certified Meraki Network Operator
